title: Downloaded Music (MP3 files) copied from laptop to Pixel 3A not found by the player
content:
Pixel 3A suddenly stopped finding music folders. 
Music Mp3 in folders were copied from laptop via Windows Explorer. They were found and playing fine before. I am using PowerAmp music player. 
I tried copying a new folder. It still does not find it.
I can see the files through Windows Explorer on the laptop. 

Please help!!
